google_translated: It seems to be one of you.

jp_text: ねぇ 見て見て 田村さん！
google_translated: Hey, see and see Mr. Tamura!

en_text: Well, their pictures are different sizes.
The point is that they're beside each other.

jp_text: シャロンおばちゃん 来たよ～｡
酸素が もれたなんて…あっ｡

en_text: This is a secret from the rest of the world.
jp_text: 世間にはヒミツよ…今の話｡
google_translated: Himitsu in the world ... Talk now.

en_text: They were just showing the Comedy Grand Prix.
jp_text: 今 お笑いグランプリやっててね➡
google_translated: Please do a comedy Grand Prix now

en_text: That boy was always looking up at the sky.
jp_text: 空ばっか見てるもんね あの子｡
六太 お前も気をつけろよ｡
google_translated: Please be careful about six times.

en_text: Yikes, that sounds like a nightmare.
jp_text: わぁ～ それ大変そう｡➡
かかりすぎよ 田村さん｡

en_text: You said that if we put a telescope on the moon,
jp_text: 月に望遠鏡 建てたら➡
google_translated: If you build a telescope in a month

jp_text: 俺が月に行って建てるよ｡➡
google_translated: I'm going to go to the moon. ➡

en_text: And I'll build the Sharon Telescope!
I can't wait to see it happen.
jp_text: わかった｡楽しみにしてる｡
google_translated: I understand. I'm looking forward to it.

en_text: The lunar telescope Sharon dreams of

jp_text: 月面に望遠鏡をつくりたいのよね｡
google_translated: I want to create a telescope on the moon.

en_text: I made that decision long ago!
I'm so happy that you remembered.
jp_text: ⦅嬉しいわ 覚えててくれて⦆

en_text: It wasn't so long ago that I wanted to forget about that promise.
Right around when you head into space.
jp_text: ムッタが宇宙へ旅立つ時期が…⦆
google_translated: The time when Mutta travels to space ...

en_text: Yeah, you know what I mean?
You're like the five Power Rangers.
jp_text: 戦隊ヒーロー５人組をさ｡ね！ね！
いや～まあ 何かいいよねぇ｡

en_text: That's an iffy color. yes, my casting is perfect!
jp_text: いや～ピッタリだね この配色！

en_text: Thank you very much. could this be...

jp_text: アハハ 靴もあるよ！

en_text: Now this is more like it!
Good thing they stuck with blue...
They will become your best comrades and worst rivals.
jp_text: 君らの一番の仲間になり➡

en_text: The astronaut candidates finally arrive at NASA!
